greeting: What can Zhuge Shenma do for you?
aboutMe: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Zhuge Shenma wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Zhuge Shenma wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Zhuge Shenma wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Zhuge Shenma wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Zhuge Shenma wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Zhuge Shenma wants to create a new file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Zhuge Shenma wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Zhuge Shenma viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Zhuge Shenma wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Zhuge Shenma recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Zhuge Shenma wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Zhuge Shenma viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Zhuge Shenma wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearch: Zhuge Shenma searched this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Zhuge Shenma wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Zhuge Shenma wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Zhuge Shenma wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Zhuge Shenma wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}
modes.didSwitchWithReason: Zhuge Shenma switched to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Zhuge Shenma wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Zhuge Shenma wants to finish this subtask

browser.rooWantsToUse: Zhuge Shenma wants to use the browser:
